body:
bitcoind 0.15
Raspberry pi

Started a `importprivkey` command that I can't abort with `abortrescan` or even `stop`.

Debug log shows no sign of stopping!
```
2017-12-13 20:46:25 Still rescanning. At block 303325. Progress=0.142537                                                                

2017-12-13 20:47:25 Still rescanning. At block 305841. Progress=0.145903                                                                

2017-12-13 20:48:25 Still rescanning. At block 308624. Progress=0.149262                                                                

2017-12-13 20:49:25 Still rescanning. At block 310925. Progress=0.152692                                                                

2017-12-13 20:50:25 Still rescanning. At block 313327. Progress=0.156138                                                                

2017-12-13 20:51:25 Still rescanning. At block 315608. Progress=0.159642                                                                

2017-12-13 20:52:25 Still rescanning. At block 317960. Progress=0.163137
```
title: abortrescan doesn't work, node unresponsive until scan finishes
